title: Jamie Bell, Cosmo Jarvis, Thomasin McKenzie Join Andrew Garfield in Paul Greengrass’ ‘The Uprising’
summary: Jamie Bell, Cosmo Jarvis and Thomasin McKenzie will travel back to 14th century England for Paul Greengrass’ “The Uprising.” The historical epic is set during the Peasants’ Revolt and stars the previously announced Andrew Garfield. Focus Features will distribute “The Uprising” domestically. The cas…
